author: NINA SUSILO, KRISTI DWI UTAMI
title: President Jokowi: Extreme Rain and Land Conversion Trigger Floods in Demak - Kompas.id
text: [›](/) [English](/kategori/english)›President Jokowi: Extreme Rain... President Jokowi: Extreme Rain and Land Conversion Trigger Floods in Demak Various emergency measures will be taken to prevent flooding in Demak from spreading. Restoration of upstream areas is also being carried out. About AI Translated Article Please note that this article was automatically translated using Microsoft Azure AI, Open AI, and Google Translation AI. We cannot ensure that the entire content is translated accurately. If you spot any errors or inconsistencies, contact us at [hotline@kompas.id](mailto:hotline@kompas.id), and we'll make every effort to address them. Thank you for your understanding. The following article was translated using both Microsoft Azure Open AI and Google Translation AI. The original article can be found in [Presiden Jokowi: Hujan Ekstrem dan Alih Fungsi Lahan Picu Banjir di Demak](https://www.kompas.id/baca/nusantara/2024/03/22/presiden-jokowi-hujan-ekstrem-dan-alih-fungsi-lahan-picu-banjir-demak) JAKARTA, KOMPAS — Extreme rainfall combined with damaged land conditions were several factors that caused major [floods](https://www.kompas.id/label/banjir?open_from=automate_body_url) to hit [Demak](https://www.kompas.id/label/demak?open_from=automate_body_url) and parts of Kudus, Java Middle. Several emergency management steps are considered to prevent widespread flooding.
